# errors

```go
import "github.com/Mgla96/snappr/internal/errors"
```

## type New

New is a convenience type for creating a const error using familiar syntax

```go
type New string
```

<a name="New.Error"></a>
### func \(New\) Error

```go
func (e New) Error() string
```

Error returns the error string
